txt.en:
'Thanks in part to Dagbert's treachery, we can no longer refrain from dealing with the Khundolar. Though it may ultimately mean our deaths, we must strike at their heart before it is too late.

'This, then, is my hope: attack Lashkarg at sunset...take them off-guard, while they are resting. Perhaps then, we may hold some hope of success.

'Will you do this, [placeholder]? If so, speak with me when you are ready to leave.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This instance quest is meant to be run Solo and cannot be run in a group.</rgb>
'Well done, [placeholder]. However, I fear that we must now brace ourselves for retaliation....'
'You are prepared to depart? Very well. May fortune go with you, [placeholder].'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This instance quest is meant to be run Solo and cannot be run in a group.</rgb>

The Khundolar war-camp has become a threat too great to ignore. Something must be done or the Easterlings will overrun Rohan.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This instance quest is meant to be run Solo and cannot be run in a group.</rgb>
Talk to Céola when you are ready to assault Lashkarg

Céola is at Etheburg in the Brown Lands.

When you are ready to begin the attack on Lashkarg, you should speak with Céola.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This instance quest is meant to be run Solo and cannot be run in a group.</rgb>
Talk to Céola at Etheburg in the Brown Lands
Céola is at Etheburg in the Brown Lands.\n\nYou should return to Céola with news of your victory.
